Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's batting is still a matter of concern for them.
Bangladesh's bowlers performed better than the batsmen.
Taskin Ahmed has taken 8 wickets in 4 matches at an economy of 7.
Hasan Mahmood has also taken six wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan can take the upper hand over Bangladesh.
Pakistan's star bowler Shaheen Afridi is back in form as he took 3 wickets for 14 runs in 3 overs against South Africa.
Shadab Khan has so far taken 8 wickets for Pakistan in the T20 World Cup 2022.
Mohammad Wasim has 7 wickets in his name in 3 matches, but experienced fast bowler Haris Rauf has proved to be a bit expensive.
Others: The match will be broadcasted on the Star Sports network on TV, and Hotstar for Indian viewers.
The probable XI for both teams are mentioned in the article.
